items.title: Apple, Nike share losses lead Dow's 250-point fall
items.description: Apple, Nike share losses lead Dow's 250-point fall

items.title: 1 Dow Jones Stock to Target This Week and 2 to Keep Off Your Radar
items.description: While the Dow Jones represents industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a safe bet. Some are facing headwinds like declining demand, rising costs, or disruptive new competitors.

items.title: Sherwin-Williams price target lowered to $400 from $430 at UBS
items.description: UBS lowered the firm’s price target on Sherwin-Williams (SHW) to $400 from $430 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm sees another challenging earnings cycle, with “largely ok” downstream earnings, while upstream/commodity earnings will be impacted by higher costs and likely weaker end of quarter demand, the analyst tells investors in a research note. UBS sees earnings misses to drive stocks down vs. provide relief. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-m
